text: Hupper = Xobt|+|(sgp t ) — We start by assuming X p¢ = 1t — We add or subtract from the best guess ... to set upper and lower bounds for plausible population parameters — Standard error describes the variability of X's given N * Sg = Clegy — Multiply by value of t that sets this area into each tail of the distribution of sample means * Normally this will be t 450 (When Clagy), toys (Clasy), toos (Clags)
